name: Expected Domains
description: For multiple domains website, it is possible that sometimes there will appear domains which are not wanted to be covered in measurement. This test checks if there are any unexpected and generally unwanted hostnames. The test needs to be configured by listing domains that are allowed and that are required to be measured in data.

constants.name: necessaryDomainsArray
constants.description: list of domains that are required to be present in the data

constants.name: permittedDomainsArray
constants.description: list of all domains that are allowed to be present in the data

blocks.description: Check that none of the necessary domains disappeared.
blocks.passMessage: No necessary domains are missing in the data.
blocks.failMessage: There are some necessary domains that are missing in the data: ${missingDomainsArrayMessage}

blocks.description: Check that there is no unexpected domain included.
blocks.passMessage: No unexpected domains are measured in the data.
blocks.failMessage: There are some sessions on unexpected domains:
